title: A while ago there was a question about those flat vanity plates.  The response was that the state is stopping them and that people can have theirs replaced when their registration renewal comes.  Well, I tried that.  I got another flat plate.  What\'s up with this?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. The flat plates are being phased out, but they're continuing to issue them until they run out of the plates they have. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=5618
